results.content: Excellent, explanations are very clear and the content is useful and logical, I'm very confident now with testing, expecially because I love Svelte! Good job for the money boss

results.content: This course is amazing. It didn't just teach me Svelte and the test driven development methodology, but also it showed the expected requirements from an actual web application. This brings comfort to the work I'm doing. I loved this course. Chapeau!
